## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] No sensitive information (credentials, API keys) is included

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added/updated XML comments for public APIs
- [ ] README or relevant docs are updated (if needed)

### Testing
- [ ] All existing tests still pass
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased

### Dependencies
- [ ] No new dependencies added
- [ ] OR: New dependencies are necessary and justified
- [ ] Package versions are compatible

### Database/Migration
- [ ] No database schema changes
- [ ] OR: Migration scripts are included and tested
- [ ] OR: Database changes are backward compatible

### Deployment Considerations
- [ ] Changes are backward compatible
- [ ] No environment variable changes required
- [ ] OR: Environment changes are documented
- [ ] No configuration changes needed
- [ ] OR: Configuration changes are documented
